about.title: About Me
description: I am a product-driven Full-Stack Developer dedicated to building scalable, high-performance web applications. I thrive in Agile environments, taking a proactive ownership role from planning to release while integrating AI workflows to significantly accelerate the development process.

With a strong foundation in the JavaScript ecosystem, .NET, and PHP, I prioritize clear communication and asking the right questions to ensure technical solutions perfectly align with user needs and business goals.
Architected and implemented scalable full-stack solutions using ASP.NET Core and React.
Delivered a custom Salesforce application to streamline business operations.
Optimized MSSQL database performance and external API integrations, reducing system latency.
Containerized applications using Docker to ensure consistent deployment environments.
Implemented WCAG accessibility standards, improving application inclusivity and user experience.
Integrated AI-driven workflows to accelerate development cycles and enhance code quality.
Collaborated in an Agile environment to deliver high-quality code using Jira and Trello.
Designed robust database architecture and backend infrastructure for Crew Management and Crew Portal Systems.
Implemented Nest.js with Fastify for API development and Prisma for database management with PostgreSQL.
Collaborated with frontend developers and QA to ensure high-quality delivery using Postman and Swagger.
Resolved frontend bugs and optimized performance using Next.js 13.
Executed local server deployment using Docker and NGINX.
Collaborated with a team to develop an innovative Event Registration System using ASP.NET Core Web API, Next.js, MSSQL, and Docker.
Automated attendee tracking through QR code technology, providing real-time event statistics.
Independently developed a comprehensive contact management system, demonstrating mastery of the full tech stack.
Navigated rigorous training paths and certification exams while applying skills to real-world assessment projects.
Co-developed 'NextGig', a mobile talent marketplace platform connecting student freelancers with clients.
Implemented mobile solutions using Expo, React Native, and TypeScript.
Developed the admin web application and landing page using Next.js and TypeScript.
Integrated Convex Cloud Services for a unified backend and Clerk for passwordless authentication.
Successfully deployed to Google Play Store, iOS App Store, and Vercel.
Created comprehensive API documentation and implemented backend APIs using CodeIgniter for the Alumni Portal.
Conducted thorough manual QA testing using Postman.
Refined frontend code for the Enterprise Resource Planning System using jQuery and JavaScript.
Collaborated closely with Senior Developers to resolve high-visibility production bugs.
Developed a Python automation solution using Pandas and NumPy to migrate legacy Excel data to a new database.
Designed a script to process and format data for the Planned Maintenance System.
Eliminated manual data entry effort while ensuring data integrity.
Accelerated operational improvements by enabling efficient system implementation.
